mapper.select: SELECT MW.WOID , MW.CUSTOMERID , MW.PRODID , C.CUSTOMERNAME , P.PRODNAME , MW.SHOPFLOOR_QTY , MW.REMARK , MW.DEL_GBN FROM TB_MESWORKORDER MW INNER JOIN TB_CUSTOMER C ON MW.CUSTOMERID=C.CUSTOMERID INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON MW.PRODID=P.PRODID WHERE 1=1 AND MW.SHOPFLOOR_QTY - MW.OUT_TOT_QTY - MW.DEFECT_TOT_QTY > 0
